name: Ethereal Fishing
description:
Sail through ethereal planes fishing for novelty and enlightenment, but beware the denizens of the void that seek to confuse, control and consume your sanity.made in about a week for fishing jam 2 and halloween jam 2016Warning:This game contains fast scrolling and flashing images, I take no responsibility for:- seizures, strokes- motion sickness, migraines- contact with elder gods or spontaneous combustion that may result from playing this game.  Control:
    WASD and/or cursor keys.
    W / cursor UP / spacebar = use stamina.
    F12 = fullscreen.
    M = mute music.
    ESC = exit.
